educations.school: Ho Chi Minh City University of Science

experiences.detail:
Owner of Lixi, Money Topup and Money Transfer microservices of Zalopay App. Including development, maintenance, enhancement and operation.
And work closely with team members to make online payment experience fast, easy and safe.
Accomplishments: Response s 90ms, Success rate 99.9%, Workload up to 2 million users at the same time.
Technologies: Spring boot, gRPC, mySql, Redis cache, Cassandra, Kafka, ActiveMQ.

Collaborate with others to develop and enhance QTE Tool, which is a private tool of DXC. QTE Tool transforms legacy codes to modern codes line by line and then the transformed codes run exactly what legacy codes did.
Accomplishments: Ouput product runs correctly, as same as speed with input product ran on AS400 or Mainframe in some cases.
Technologies: Java 8, Oracle, Memcach

Implementing Insurance Fee System for Sapporo city, Japan. Accomplishments: Processing a huge of data to calculate and export report fles.
Technologies: Spring framework, myBatis, Hibernate, Oracle
